page.title: 09TRADE AND INDUSTRY
page.content: Pudsey's industries are located in {a)}18th and 19th century stone mills spread over the built-up areas and beside streams which were the original power source. {b)}purpose-built units on an industrial estate situated between major road and rail links. Few old mills serve their original purpose.Some have moved over to man-made fibres whilst others have been converted into smaller units, e.g.small warehouses,a printer's shop,a plumber's suppliers.In the main the modern units house distribution sites for national companies or small firms concerned with home improvement. Several metal-based industries concentrate on specialist items,e.g. park fencing and castings.Regrettably many units, both old and new,display the all-too-familiar{TO LET}signs.
